co2AlertThreshold.title: CO2 Alert Threshold
co2AlertThreshold.description: When to consider that the CO2 level is too high (in ppm).

batteryAlertThreshold.title: Battery Alert Threshold
batteryAlertThreshold.description: When to consider that the battery is low (in %).

sensorDataRefreshInterval.title: Sensor Data Refresh Interval
sensorDataRefreshInterval.description: How often we should get data from the sensor (in seconds).

bluetoothReadyTimeout.title: Bluetooth Ready Timeout
bluetoothReadyTimeout.description: How long to wait for Bluetooth to be ready (in seconds)

bluetoothDeviceSearchTimeout.title: Bluetooth Device Search Timeout
bluetoothDeviceSearchTimeout.description: How long to wait for Bluetooth device discovery (in seconds).
